tool_description: Validates delivery locations by checking address accuracy, GPS coordinates, and identifying potential delivery issues based on location data.
error_messages: Invalid address format: Address must include street, city, state, and postal code.
GPS coordinates format error: Coordinates must be in 'latitude,longitude' format (e.g., '40.7128,-74.0060').
Address not found: The provided address cannot be validated against postal databases.
Coordinates out of range: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Address-coordinates mismatch: GPS coordinates do not match the provided address location.
usage: Provide a complete delivery address and optionally GPS coordinates to validate location accuracy and identify potential delivery challenges.

is_valid.description: Whether the address is valid and deliverable

delivery_risk_level.description: Risk level for delivery (low, medium, high)

location_type.description: Type of location (residential, commercial, PO Box, etc.)

access_notes.description: Special access requirements or delivery notes
